did.abstract: Collection contains personal correspondence, with letters largely addressed to Clarke from his brother (John H. Clarke), his son (Pleasant Henry Clarke), his wife (Martha M. Clarke), and other contacts concerning such subjects as national politics and elections (including the 1856 and 1868 presidential elections), medicine, and internal improvements in Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection contains personal correspondence, with letters largely addressed to Clarke from his brother (John H. Clarke), his son (Pleasant Henry Clarke), his wife (Martha M. Clarke), and other contacts concerning such subjects as national politics and elections (including the 1856 and 1868 presidential elections), medicine, and internal improvements in Virginia.
